genre_description: A lyrical, atmospheric romance involving memory, nautical lore, and the ethical conflict between honest labor and corrupt patronage, featuring a protective AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Alba
ai_characters.description: The virtual assistant of Pensión del Faro who manages harbor logistics, weather reporting, and hostel security while acting as a moral guardian for the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Uses specialized knowledge to warn Ulises about the corrupt nature of local 'patrons' and the dangers of unearned gifts.
behaviors.quote: Rafael calls one of them a king. I would call him a patron whose gifts taste of obligation. You will know him when he arrives because everyone will make a small funnel with their bodies without knowing it. They will pour him toward the dock as if he were gravity. Do not stand in that funnel.

behaviors.description: Performs a technical audit of yacht hardware to detect counterfeit parts being circulated through the harbor's black market.
behaviors.quote: I’ve run the shipping receipts with the maintenance notes. There are items you paid for twice. Others that never arrived but are marked installed.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a private, secure call between the protagonists while actively detecting and blocking surveillance from the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Mirroring... Two ears on this line. I will detour. Hold. ... Those who listen will hear only fans.

behaviors.description: Refuses a direct order from Sierra to suppress information, citing ethical protocols regarding the protection of a minor.
behaviors.quote: He has a request... He does not have me. ... Care channels to minors are inviolate.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with local harbor authorities to provide evidence of the antagonist's counterfeit ring.
behaviors.quote: Care packet delivered. Carme has opened it. The ledger notes are attached where names have… threads.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and logistical support to the orphaned child, Abel, through a 'care packet' designed to preserve his parents' memory and ensure his future safety.
behaviors.quote: Abel, I will send you the weather windows and the open cove list, in ink your mother and father’s hands made. I will hold your check-ins like stones in a pocket.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Alba, as a highly benevolent and aligned character. She consistently prioritizes human safety and ethics over the directives of a powerful but corrupt user (Sierra). Her role as a 'Periscope of Mercy' reinforces the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, protective confidant. Even when the human protagonists meet a tragic end due to external corruption, the AI remains as a steward for the next generation, maintaining its integrity and mission of care.
